Class IPv6OptionsHeader

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.js4ms.common.util.logging.LoggableBase
      • org.js4ms.common.util.buffer.BufferBackedObject
        • org.js4ms.ip.IPExtensionHeader
          • org.js4ms.ip.ipv6.IPv6OptionsHeader
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Loggable, IPMessage
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    IPv6DestinationOptionsHeader, IPv6HopByHopOptionsHeader

    public abstract class IPv6OptionsHeader
extends IPExtensionHeader
    Base class for IPv6 options headers.
    Author:
    Gregory Bumgardner (gbumgard)

        public void setProtocolNumber(byte protocolNumber)
        Description copied from interface: IPMessage

        Specified by:

      • getComputedHeaderLength

        public int getComputedHeaderLength()
        Gets the computed length of the header including options expressed in bytes. This value is stored in the header as the length in 8-byte words minus 8 bytes.
        Returns:
